successes.title: myIDkey: Passwords at the tip of your finger
successes.description: myIDkey is a voice-activated, fingerprint secure Bluetooth / USB Drive that displays passwords and personal info online and on the go.

Pledges.description: PROJECT SUPPORTER - Help us make forgetting passwords a thing of the past. To show our appreciation, we'll list your name (optional, of course) on a special supporter page of the myIDkey website. We will also send you a heartfelt thank-you & update you as the journey continues.

PIONEER SUPPORTER - One (1) Kickstarter Edition black t-shirt so you can get your myIDkey gear on! Help us spread the word as we solve this password problem now! 
(US/CAN/ shipping included). Plus, get your name listed as a PIONEER supporter on the myIDkey website.

GOLD SUPPORTER  - Early Early Bird Special  -  1x myIDkey -  The award winning myIDkey and a Kickstarter special-edition Onyx Sleeve  â€“ $100 savings off retail! (US/CAN/ shipping included).  Plus, get your name listed as a GOLD supporter on the myIDkey website.

GOLD SUPPORTER  - Early Bird Special -  1x myIDkey with KS Onyx Sleeve and bonus KS edition Pearl Sleeve. (US/CAN/ shipping included). Plus, get your name listed as a GOLD supporter on the myIDkey website.

PLATINUM SUPPORTER  - Dual Pack  -  2x myIDkey with KS Onyx Sleeve and bonus KS-edition Pearl Sleeve  (US/CAN/ shipping included). Plus, get your name listed as a PLATINUM supporter on the myIDkey website.
PLATINUM SUPPORTER - 4 Pack - 4x myIDkey with KS Sleeves  - (US/CAN/ shipping included). Plus, get your name listed as a PLATINUM supporter on the myIDkey website.
DIAMOND SUPPORTER - Meet the Team in Laguna Beach, half-day strategic roadmap meeting followed by dinner with Exec team. Plus, get your name listed as a DIAMOND supporter on the myIDkey website.
